overview:
Johnny is responsible for all marketing actions in the EMEA region for Intel Capital. This includes supervising sponsorships, relations with PR and various marketing programs. In addition to this, he is also responsible for all events from Intel Capital in EMEA, such as participation in industry events, speakerships, as well as the organization of the Intel Capital Technology Days in EMEA.

Prior to Intel Capital, Johnny has been working at Intel Corporation in a number of marketing roles in the corporate events group and the corporate marketing group in EMEA. Prior to Intel Corporation, he held marketing positions in Yucom (internet provider, joint venture between BT and ING in Belgium), Xircom Europe and Bull.
